actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from OMB.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA; Defense Department.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from VA.

official_title: A bill to amend section 3105 of title 38, United States Code, to authorize, with respect to persons eligible to receive certain types of retirement pay as well as pension or compensation from the Veterans' Administration, the inclusion of both such categories of benefits in a single periodic payment.

summary.text: Authorizes the Veterans' Administration to enter into agreements with departments making retirement payments to veterans eligible for compensation under laws administered by the Administration to have such departments make one joint payment which specifies which parts of each payment are attributable to which benefit.
